name: MM Card Game
description:
Unfinished Card Game I made that emulates Hearthstone and MTG Arena.

Instructions:

You have a certain amount of energy each turn. Each card in your hand costs a given amount of energy.

You can play one creature per turn. This monster is energized. You can make this monster attack if you have the right card and it is energized or defend.

Your opponent has the same abilities and, if your opponent is not defending, you can attack them directly and take their health to 0!
